headline: Apple Has A 'Siri-Ous' Problem On Its Hands

headline: BlackRock Large Cap Focus Growth V.I. Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The fund posted a return of 6.12% (Class I shares) for the fourth quarter of 2024. The largest exposures were in the IT, consumer discretionary, and communication services sectors.

headline: Apple loses German antitrust appeal, opening door for greater controls
